column5: Nestled in the hills of Westlake, our home is located in one of THE most convenient, safe and beautiful neighborhoods of Austin, TX. Only 15 minutes from airport. Zilker Park, Barton Springs, and downtown Austin are approx. 5 minutes away. Walk to coffee shops, grocery store, and parks. Home is also steps away from BUS LINE 30. Youâ€™ll love it because of the PRIME LOCATION and the privacy decks which back to greenbelt. Our place is good for couples, business travelers, and families (with kids).
column8: SXSW - 5 Minutes to Downtown! Walk to Cafe/Shops!
